newsitem.title: USA: Muni bond sales total $567 mln for Tuesday.
newsitem.headline: Muni bond sales total $567 mln for Tuesday.

text.p: Scheduled competitive and negotiated municipal bond sales for Tuesday are expected to total $567 million in 33 offerings, according to Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group.
Competitive sales total $178 million in 24 sales. The largest is a two-part $48.3 million Richardson Independent School District, Texas, general obligation issue at 1200 EST.
Negotiated sales total $289 million in nine offerings. The largest is a $163 million Ohio Building Authority issue through AG Edwards & Sons.
An additional $616 million of deals are on the possible calendar, meaning underwriters have said they may price the issues Tuesday depending on market conditions.
